Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'With these units installed, the mission is basically over.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, come here if your survey equipment is all set up.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta activates the module in her hand and begins to sync up the equipment.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Running at full capacity. Switching to automatic mode... Looks good.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Okay. Now, let's learn how to pitch a tent.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why?!', 3: '11', 4: 'Do we need to stay here overnight?', 5: '12'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Because the last part of the mission requires us to keep watch here overnight. So, now's a good time to learn.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yeah, our last mission is to keep watch here all night.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The equipment from Babylonia can help us set up camp quickly, but I still prefer doing things the old-fashioned way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'With that being said, Commandant, do you know that tents are divided into freestanding and non-freestanding ones?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Ah, of course. You are a military personnel. I'll skip the basics then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Simply put, freestanding tents have a support structure that makes it ideal for learners. Most of the fishermen in the ARU use these tents.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Non-freestanding tents require an added support structure, making them more difficult to assemble.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But, this allows them to be set up anywhere, which makes it more portable once you're familiar with it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "So, Commandant... Let's pitch a non-freestanding tent today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "(Mumbles) ...And that's not because I lost the support rods or anything.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'On the vast and empty snowfield, even a quiet mumble can be heard crystal-clear.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Non-freestanding tents typically use trees for support. So we need to find two trees roughly three meters apart.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, let's go look.", 3: '29', 4: '...That might be a little difficult.', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...Well, bad news is that most of the nearby trees were cut down while developing the ARU. I don't think we'll be able to find a suitable camping site.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Scanning around, not even a single tree can be seen among the vast snowfield.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We used to be able to find firewood here... Sigh, just my luck...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if all hope was lost, Rosetta picks up a pebble and hurls it after a long exasperated sigh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Oh. This time, it skipped twelve times. A vast improvement.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Flabby Arctic rolls... Who's throwing rocks into the water?!"}
{3: 'An angry wave surges up, revealing a familiar figure.'}
{2: 'Oh, another bullseye?!', 3: '41', 4: 'You live down there or something?!', 5: '42'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'So, you ARE doing it on purpose!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'I live on shore, obviously. This is just my favorite spot to sunbathe!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Look at the ARU technology. Their bionic bears are so realistically made that they even sunbathe.'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Try living in me shoes, aye? Try getting a rock to your noggin every time you clock off from the climate station!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'And what is it with you two?! Do you humans and Constructs have nothing better to do?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "We told you last time. We're on a mission.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "...Oh yeah, you did, aye, didn't you? So what's with the rocks again? Lost another module?", 4: '1'}
{2: "We don't have a place to pitch our tent.", 3: '51', 4: "First of all though, I didn't throw the rock.", 5: '52'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'A tent...? You camping here or something?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Whatever, it's all the same. Why do you have this pile of fabric on the ground anyway? Are you trying to camp or something?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I just wanted to teach Commandant how to pitch tents in the Arctic for the final mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But this ended up not going as planned. The tent is going nowhere.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'You two are a bunch of brain wranglers... But if you just need a shelter, I have an idea.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Save us, Master Bear!', 3: '60', 4: "You don't mean the ocean, do you?", 5: '61'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Don't call me Master Bear, makes me sound like some weirdo... Whatever, if you need help then let's build an igloo.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "What kind of numbskull idea is that? I'm saying you can build an igloo.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Right... An igloo also works. Not to mention it can be built anywhere... I completely forgot about it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Aight, quit dozing and get cracking. Construct, you'll do the shaping. 【kuroname】, you pile up the snow.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How big do you want the snowballs?', 3: '67', 4: 'We just need to pile it up?', 5: '70'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "About waist-high, but don't make them too big. Last time, a ten-meter tall snowball came rolling onto shore and just about scared me half to death.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Just mush it all into a ball. The Construct can handle the finer details later.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You both follow the bionic bear's safety-first instructions and quickly build an igloo. Rosetta uses her spear to carve a perfect sphere out of the snowball."}
{3: 'And finally—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Good work. You make Master Bear proud.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'An immaculate igloo with a streamlined arc stands before you. The pristine snow is even glistering under the sunlight.'}
{3: 'Rosetta covers the entrance of the igloo with the tent canvas to block the freezing wind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Work's done, fellas. Let's go in and see if this igloo's a warmer!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The three of you crawl into the igloo. Without any light, you cannot get a feel of your surroundings.'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: 'Well. Feels pretty warm in here.'}
{3: 'Like what the bear says, you feel an immediate temperature difference upon entering the igloo, but—'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's a bit cramped in here..."}
{3: 'Though equipped with the knowledge of the how-to, no one has ever built an igloo before, causing this size miscalculation.'}
{3: 'In the end, you have created an... S-sized snow hut.'}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Oi, Construct, can't you put your weapon outside? Your pokey bits are stabbing at me..."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Sorry, but you'll have to get over it. You never know when we might be attacked. Only soldiers that can endure can seize the final victory."}
{2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "I'm not here to make war, girl!"}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Ah!'}
{3: 'The bear props up involuntarily in an almost slapstick retort, causing the small igloo to collapse and bury everyone in snow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Ugh... Just my lucky day.', 4: '1'}
